-e ---

𓇋𓂋 ار ar < اگر agar ⇔ or / and
𓇋𓂋 whether < feather 𓇋𓂋 wäre verily … gar ghar far for if falls ġefeall 𓇋𓂋 ⇔ part either

𒌋 u 𒌑 𒅇 if whether verily < part > or when may
𒉕 gen / gan / 𒃶/𒃷? 𒂷 ga 𒂵
𒉕 gen given 𐌾𐌰𐌱𐌰𐌹 ᶢwhen 𐌹𐌱𐌰𐌹 even if
𒉈 den dé.en : es sei denn ⇔ sein
𒌋 10 ⇔ den ⇔ 𓏙 don given even
𒌋 10 𒋧 ŠÚM ∑ give

⇔ 𒉺𒀀𒄿 pāi pay:give (back) 𒁁𒌍 pé-eš beget
